basisSet.dc:title: cc-pwCVDZ
basisSet.dct:abstract: DZP Double Zeta + Polarization + Tight Core
basisSet.dc:description:
Correlation Consistent Polarized Weighted Core/Valence Double Zeta (cc-pwCVDZ) Basis -------------------------------------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction References B - Ne: (10s,5p,1d) -> [4s,3p,1d] T.H. Dunning, Jr. J.C.P. 90, 1007 (1989). Al - Ar: (13s,9p,2d) -> [5s,4p,2d] K.A. Peterson and T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 117, 10548 (2002).
The correlation consistent core-valence basis sets extend the ideas of the original cc-pVxZ sets by including extra functions designed for core-core and core-valence correlation. The weighted core/valence basis sets weight the KL intershell correlation energy at the expense of the KK correlation.
